author: HiAscend
body:
# now i use Ubuntu 18.04.1 LTS \n \l in window10 1903 sub linux system
PowerShell 6.2.2
1、 i use bash
`apt-get install lrzsz`
2、when i install successful
`sz someFileName`  then the shell is dead , i must restart the window
it return "*B00000000000000"
`rz` is also dead 
3、i use xshell is ok, though ssh.
is there only me happend?
title: Feature Request:can support lrzsz?
